0.9.0.0.name: connect20/Me_Newslettername
0.9.0.0.description: The extension allows for requesting a name when a visitor signs up for the newsletter as guest. Therefore, providing a name becomes compulsory for non-logged-in visitors as well.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
